channel.title: Meta Mesh Wireless Communities
channel.description: Recent content on Meta Mesh Wireless Communities
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2020 Meta Mesh Wireless Communities. Share our content freely.

item.title: Works
item.description: The Meta Mesh Network uses different strategies to address different neighborhood or event needs–basically, we wear many hats.

item.title: How to Help
item.description: As a nonprofit, there are three main ways that we can continue to provide deeply needed Internet services to underserved communities for a low cost:

item.title: More
item.description: Additional Reading We strive to be transparent by ensuring that any member of the public, regardless of their base knowledge of WiFi technologies, can understand our mission.

item.title: Who We Are
item.description: Table of Contents Our Mission Our Vision Our Values Our Team Our Board of Directors Research COVID-19 Notice Heinz Endowment Grant Partnerships Our Mission To bridge the Digital Divide in a meaningful and permanent way by building Community Wireless Networks in Pittsburgh and around the world.
